# datafy_account (Resource)

Datafy account

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datafy_account" "example" {
  name = "example-account"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) account name

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) account id
- `parent_account_id` (String) parent account id
